title: Taming Encha
description: "Within the darkest depths of my soul, it is my task, my duty, to transmute my negative emotions into positive thoughts and an attitude befitting an incarnated High Lord. I know it is difficult and the way ahead of me is stacked with seemingly insurmountable obstacles. What the entities around me need is a positive leader to look up to. An eternal optimist that sees everything as growth opportunities. Someone who encourages people to perform to their very best. I am Han, and this is my life-memory . . ." - Han StormThe time has come to visit Encha and her wet jungles of hell. Join Han as he faces life-changing choices, danger and intrigue at every unexpected and unpredictable turn in his multi-dimensional world.  This volume includes a Graphic Starmap, a full colour Galaxy Plate and the updated version of 'Who-is-Who' in Han's World (with descriptions)!Available direct from author www.chroniclesofhan.com
author: H.  Gibson
